start.name: You
sentences: (Voice clear, calm, final) The noise is gone. All the terrifying static, the collapsing walls... they've vanished. I feel utterly stable.

lyra_perfect_smile.name: Lyra
sentences: (Solid, perfect smile) You made the right choice, my love. Why would you ever leave this peace for the harsh, unpredictable edges of the outside?

ranting.name: You
sentences: The Guardian showed me so many horrible things. So much collapse, so much raw pain hidden in the Residues...

guardian_said.name: Guardian
sentences: (Echoing, soft, from the air) That was the echo of a past you did not need to claim. Here, there is no consequence for peace.

echo_said.name: You
sentences: (A long, deep sigh of relinquishment) I feel... whole. Even if the details of who I was are still blurry. This world is safer than anything outside that door could offer.

touching_face.name: You
sentences: (Final resolution) Then there is nothing left to search for. There is nothing left to remember.
